DataBase - Class in BackEndUtility
Class that represents the database of the platform, which contains all the users, products, and orders.

Constructor for a new database with no users

displayBuyers() - Method in class UIs.Buyer.Controllers.ProfileController
Displays the list of UniShop's buyers, and displays action options for the buyer to choose from: get a buyer's profile, filter buyers, display the user's followers, and return to menu.

Method that displays the shopping cart page, which allows the buyer to see and interact with the products he has added to his cart

Displays the entire catalog organized by categories, and prints the list of sellers.
displayCatalog() - Method in class UIs.Buyer.Controllers.CatalogController
Displays the catalog and provides options to: get a product, Get a seller's info and products filter products, filter sellers and display products liked by the buyers you follow The user can interact with everone of these options.

Displays the main menu for the Seller, providing various options, as, display their profile, order history, the inventory of products, their notifications, metrics, followers, customers, and log out by handling user input.
